### Application for a Hybrid Multi-mode Microplate Reader

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the competitive-selective tendering method.

#### Notice Details
| **Item** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)  | 5000066774  |
| Publication Date (date de publication)  | 2022-08-09 |
| Tender Closing Date (date d'appel d'offres)  | 2022-09-19T14:00:00 |

#### Procurement Information
The Government of Canada invites bid submissions for the supply of one (1) hybrid multi-mode microplate reader.

The required machine must be capable of detecting various signals (UV-Vis absorbance, fluorescence, fluorescence polarization, time-resolved fluorescence, time-resolved fluorescence resonance energy transfer, and luminescence) with several read modes (endpoint, kinetic, spectral scanning, and well area scanning). It also needs to support 96 and 384 well microplate formats, temperature control (up to 70°C with a 4-zone system), linear, orbital, and double orbital shaking, and a xenon flash light source.

#### Selection and Evaluation Criteria
Proposal submissions will be assessed based on the following:

* Proposer's capacity to meet the bid specifications.
* The appropriateness of the proposal's scope, timeline, and budget.
* The proposer's demonstrated expertise and relevant experience.

#### Important Dates and Details
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-19T14:00:00
* Contracting Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Alexandra Ghiatau, Purchaser
	+ Phone: 438-801-0771
	+ Email: alexandra.ghiatau@ec.gc.ca
* Requested Attachments: Proposal Submissions, Contract

#### Disclaimer
Note that this RFP has already expired, so no new bids will be accepted.
